item.title: Highlighted
item.description: If you’ve ever read a book that’s full of things want to remember you probably marked up pages in the book itself or took notes elsewhere. Highlighted is a handy little app that lets you easily capture all the important snippets of text you’d ever want, and makes them a breeze to find later on. Here are some of my favourite details. Modal views Modal views present content in a separate mode from the user’s current context (more on that here).
